full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement #TSA-2023-8056692
#### Title: TSB IT Cloud Modernization and Safety Analysis
#### Date: 2023-05-26
#### Closing Date: 2023-07-04, 14:00

The Transportation Safety Board of Canada (TSB) is seeking the services of a contractor to provide IT resources for cloud modernization and safety analysis. This requirement is open to Supply Arrangement Holders (EN578-170432) who have qualified under Tier 1 in the National Capital Region.

**Key Services:**

- Ensuring cloud compliance for custom TSB applications currently hosted on-premises
- Modernizing the Safety Analysis application
- Providing expertise in cloud architecture, application development, and project management

**Requirements:**

- Level 2 (intermediate) resources with expertise in the following categories:
  - Programmer/Software Developer
  - Application/Software Architect
  - Project Manager
  - Business Analyst

**Description:**

The TSB requires IT resources to assist the IM/IT development team in modernizing its custom applications and ensuring cloud compliance. Bidders may submit a bid for one or all resource categories. The work will involve cloud modernization and safety analysis, and bidders must demonstrate expertise in cloud architecture, application development, and project management.

**Notice Details:**

* Solicitation Number: TSB-2023-8056692
* Reference Number: cb-5923-60655080
* Amendment Number: 4
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Gatineau, National Capital Region

**Contract Information:**

* Contracting Entity Name: Transportation Safety Board of Canada
* Contracting Entity Address: 200 Prom. Du Portage, Gatineau, Québec K1A 1K8
* Contact Person: Nicholas Warren, (873) 353-5855, Nicholas.Warren@bst-tsb.gc.ca

**Tender Documents:**

* Tender Notice in English: [Attachment 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5923/8056692---tbips_npp---it-cloud-modernization.pdf)
* Tender Notice in French: [Attachment 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5923/8056692--tbips_n
